Upload your manuscript here to comply with the REF.

You should upload your Accepted Author Manuscript. This is your version of the manuscript after peer review and including any final changes, but it is likely not to have been typeset or copy-edited by a publisher.

Need to pay a publisher's fee?

To ensure your work is eligible for REF, please upload your manuscript.

If you have already opted for a “pay to publish” model you may need to pay an Article Processing Charge, or APC. Depending on the funder, the University can support you in covering this publishing fee.

Open access funds are available at the University, funded by RCUK and The Wellcome Trust. Both funding bodies have set conditions linked to the use of a publisher’s fee.

The University can pay for colour and page charges and colour charges for images for RCUK funded articles only. The University cannot pay for other funders’ colour, page and image charges; these are the responsibility of the author.

If you have any queries or require guidance then please contact us.
